data.eml:eml: A new species of Nitocra Boeck, 1865 (Harpacticoida, Ameiridae, Ameirinae) from South Africa, with notes on its ecology and remarks on the status of Nitocra sewelli husmanni Kunz, 1976

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gomez, Samuel, Carrasco, Nicola K., Morales-Serna, Francisco Neptali (2012): A new species of Nitocra Boeck, 1865 (Harpacticoida, Ameiridae, Ameirinae) from South Africa, with notes on its ecology and remarks on the status of Nitocra sewelli husmanni Kunz, 1976. ZooKeys 244: 33-58, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.2633, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.244.2633
